name: Nicko's bits of code
tagline: Random little bits of code that do fun, interesting and/or useful stuff.
body:
### Nicko's coding projects.
I often write code for fun or to solve problems that I have. Every so often I think that other people might find the code fun or might need to solve the same problems. This site is a hub for finding that code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
